name: Rotten Tomatoes
description: Throw tomatoes at things you dont like.

playsound.name: Play Splat Sound
playsound.description: Play a splat sound when the tomato hits.

customimages.name: Custom Images
customimages.description: Allows using custom images for throwing the tomatoes (requires some setup, gifs not supported)

ctomatoscale.name: Tomato Starting Scale
ctomatoscale.description: Scale the tomato just in case its too big or small.

ctomatoendingscale.name: Tomato Ending Scale
ctomatoendingscale.description: End scale of tomato just before it hits

ctomatosplatimage.name: Custom Tomato Splat Image (Optional)
ctomatosplatimage.description: Custom tomato image to show once splat. If no image is uploaded, it will just use your tomato image.

ctomatosplatscale.name: Tomato Splat Scale
ctomatosplatscale.description: Scale the splat tomato image just in case its too big or small. (or make it really big for comedic effect)
